cause.description:
We feel, here at the kill scout cause, that having such a useless, loud and generally purposeless animal around doesn't do anything but drain our air, dirty our space, and attack random people. Join me, in killing the damn dog.
1. To kill scout in the most unbait way possible
2. Cook the dog on low heat for several hours on brodies BBQ
3. To feed jane her precious animal unknowingly
cause.mission: kill scout, brodies dog, and inevitably cook him on the BBQ
cause.name: KILL SCOUT
